name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps:
Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Cook bacon in a large pan until crispy, then remove and chop.
In the same pan, saut√© garlic for 1 minute.
Whisk eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and immediately toss with egg mixture, bacon, and garlic.
Season with black pepper and serve hot.
